0P0000764T.TO.long_name: VPI Global Equity Pool Series A
0P0000764T.TO.summary: VPI Foreign Equity Poolâs objective is to generate longer-term growth in value through the increase in the value of its holdings, and through the receipt and reinvestment of dividend income from its holdings. It invests in equity securities issued primarily by non-Canadian companies.
0P0000764T.TO.manager_bio: TIM BURT - 28 years experience, Cardinal Capital (10yrs), London Life Insurance (6yrs), Richardson Greenshields (6yrs), B.S., M.S. Finance - University of Illinois, CFA (1979)

0P0000A97N.TO.long_name: Barometer Tactical Income Pool - Class A
0P0000A97N.TO.summary: The investment objective of the High Income Pool is to achieve long-term capital appreciation and to minimize risk by diversifying product type and purchasing income investments that exhibit the best risk reward. The portfolio of the High Income Pool may include, preferred shares, treasury bills, provincial and federal bonds, corporate and convertible bonds, dividend paying common stocks (stapled units), income trusts (including real estate income trusts (REITS).
0P0000A97N.TO.manager_bio: Mr. Guichon is the Chief Portfolio Manager of Barometer Capital Management Inc.; previously, from July 2, 2004 Mr. Guichon was Managing Director, Portfolio Management of Rockwater Asset Management Inc.; prior thereto from late 2000, Mr. Guichon was Vice President of Blackmont Capital Inc.; and, prior thereto, Mr. Guichon worked in corporate banking and then joined Scotia McLeod as an investment executive. Mr. Guichon has over 30 years experience in the investment industry.

0P0000XXUX.TO.long_name: Barometer Disciplined Leadership Tactical Income and Growth Fund - Class A
0P0000XXUX.TO.summary: The Fundâs objective is to generate income and long term capital growth by investing in a combination of equity and fixed income securities of issuers located anywhere in the world, including those in emerging markets. 0P00013NC2.TO.summary: The fundamental investment objective is to seek to provide income and moderate capital growth by investing primarily in income-producing securities of issuers in North America.
0P00013NC2.TO.manager_bio: David Sykes joined TD Asset Management Inc. (TDAM) in 1999 and currently heads Public Equities. David is lead manager of the TD North American Dividend Fund, TD U.S. Monthly Income Fund, and TD Tactical Monthly Income Funds. In addition, David co-manages the TD Strategic Yield Fund and is a member of the TD Wealth Asset Allocation Committee. David has a Bachelor of Commerce and a Bachelor of Arts from Saint Maryâs University, an MA in Politics, Philosophy and Economics from Oxford University, and an MSc in International Relations from the London School of Economics. He is a CFA charterholder.

0P0001FIQR.TO.long_name: Fidelity CanAm Opportunities Currency Neutral Class T8
0P0001FIQR.TO.summary: The Fund aims to achieve long-term capital growth by investing primarily in equity securities of Canadian and U.S companies. The Fund can invest in these securities either directly or indirectly through investments in underlying funds. The Fund uses derivatives to try to minimize the exposure to currency fluctuations between foreign currencies in developed markets and the Canadian dollar.
0P0001FIQR.TO.manager_bio:
Steve MacMillan is a portfolio manager for Pyramis Global Advisors, a Fidelity Investments company. He manages Fidelity Small Cap America Fund and is a member of Team Canada, the Canadian equity research team for investment products sold through Fidelity Investments Canada ULC. 

Steve earned a BBA from Wilfred Laurier University and is a Chartered Financial Analyst charterholder.

0P0001HD30.TO.long_name: Purpose Core Dividend Fund - Series XUA
0P0001HD30.TO.summary: The Purpose Core Dividend Fund seeks to provide shareholders with (i) long-term capital appreciation through investment in a portfolio of high quality North American dividend-paying equity securities; and (ii) monthly distributions.
